Source: Durante o tempo que passam no Chile, percebem a necessidade de uma tradução para o espanhol do Livro de Mórmon.
First English Translation: During their time in Chile, they realize the need for a Spanish translation of the Book of Mormon.
Final Refined Translation: During their time in Chile, they recognize the necessity for a Spanish translation of the Book of Mormon.

Source: Posteriormente, o mesmo sonho se repetiu.
First English Translation: Subsequently, the same dream was repeated.
Final Refined Translation: Later on, the same dream happened again.

Source: Há um tipo de alegria e satisfação que somente é compreendida por meio de sentimentos espirituais.
First English Translation: There is a kind of joy and satisfaction that is only understood through spiritual feelings.
Final Refined Translation: There exists a type of joy and satisfaction that can only be grasped through spiritual emotions.

Source: 5. Exatidão dos Dados Informados.
First English Translation: 5. Accurate of the Informed Data.
Final Refined Translation: 5. Accuracy of the Reported Data.

Source: As ordenanças continuarão na sua lista até que alguém as aceite.
First English Translation: Ordinances will remain on your list until someone accepts them.
Final Refined Translation: The ordinances will stay on your list until someone accepts them.

Source: Além de suas próprias provações pessoais, muitos enfrentaram e continuam a enfrentar preconceitos e mal-entendidos culturais mesmo em sua ala ou seu ramo.
First English Translation: In addition to their own personal trials, many have faced and continue to face prejudices and cultural misunderstandings even in their ward or their branch.
Final Refined Translation: Besides their own personal trials, many individuals have faced and continue to face biases and cultural misunderstandings, even within their respective wards or branches.

Source: Ocorreu um erro ao salvar seu retrato.
First English Translation: An error occurred saving his portrait.
Final Refined Translation: An error occurred while saving your portrait.

Source: Clique na caixa de seleção à esquerda de cada pessoa cujas ordenanças você deseja cancelar a reserva.
First English Translation: Click the check box to the left of each person whose ordinances you want to cancel the reservation.
Final Refined Translation: Click on the checkbox to the left of each person whose reservations you wish to cancel.

Source: A indexação de registros é o acelerador que dá ao site FamilySearch.org o poder de conectar você aos seus antepassados.
First English Translation: Record indexing is the accelerator that gives the e FamilySearch.org sit the power to connect you to your forebears.
Final Refined Translation: The indexing of records acts as the catalyst that empowers FamilySearch.org to link you with your ancestors.

Source: Tabela para listar até quatro gerações de antepassados.
First English Translation: Table to list up to four generations of ancestors.
Final Refined Translation: Table for listing up to four generations of ancestors.

Source: E essa é a razão, porque o Espírito foi persistente.
First English Translation: And that is the reason, because the Spirit was persistent.
Final Refined Translation: And that is the reason the Spirit was persistent.

Source: Apesar de as ordenanças vicárias realizadas fora de sequência serem válidas, elas tornam-se eficazes somente depois que forem realizadas as ordenanças exigidas previamente.
First English Translation: Although vicarious ordinances performed out of sequence are valid, they become effective only after the ordinances previously required are performed.
Final Refined Translation: Although the vicarious ordinances performed out of sequence are valid, they only become effective after the previously required ordinances have been carried out.

Source: No mundo todo, como irmãos e irmãs no evangelho, podemos aprender uns com os outros, tornar-nos mais unidos e aumentar nosso amor mútuo.
First English Translation: All over the world, as brothers and sisters in the gospel, we can learn from each other, become more united and increase our mutual love.
Final Refined Translation: Worldwide, as brothers and sisters in the gospel, we can learn from one another, become more united, and enhance our mutual love.

Source: O chamado, Jorge Orlando Cocco Santangelo Prêmio de Compra
First English Translation: The call, Jorge Orlando Cocco Santangelo Purchase Award
Final Refined Translation: The Jorge Orlando Cocco Santangelo Purchasing Award

Source: O membro da Igreja John M. Bernhisel copiou partes de um manuscrito do Velho Testamento e um manuscrito separado do Novo Testamento cerca de um ano após a morte de Joseph Smith, quando Emma Smith emprestou a Bernhisel os manuscritos por um período de quase três meses.
First English Translation: Church member John M. Bernhisel copied parts of an Old Testament manuscript and a separate manuscript from the New Testament about a year after Joseph Smith's death, when Emma Smith lent Bernhisel the manuscripts for a period of nearly three months.
Final Refined Translation: John M. Bernhisel, a member of the Church, copied parts of an Old Testament manuscript and a separate manuscript of the New Testament approximately a year after the death of Joseph Smith, when Emma Smith lent the manuscripts to Bernhisel for nearly three months.

Source: Enquanto as dimensões, funções e alguns aspectos da sua aparência foram especificados por revelação, outros elementos foram deixados para os líderes e trabalhadores locais decidirem.
First English Translation: While the dimensions, functions and some aspects of their appearance were specified by revelation, other elements were left to local leaders and workers to decide.
Final Refined Translation: While the dimensions, functions, and several aspects of their appearance were defined through divine revelation, other elements were left to the discretion of local leaders and workers.

Source: Acabei de terminar meu primeiro lote!
First English Translation: I just finished my first batch!
Final Refined Translation: I have just completed my first batch!

Source: Incentivamos você a examinar todas as informações encontradas em cada uma das diretrizes antes de enviar.
First English Translation: We encourage you to look at all the information found in each of the guidelines before submitting.
Final Refined Translation: We encourage you to carefully review all the information found in each of the guidelines before submitting.

Source: Alguns dias depois de enviar essas cartas, Joseph e seus companheiros na prisão foram levados da cadeia e apresentados a um tribunal superior em Gallatin.
First English Translation: A few days after sending these letters, Joseph and his fellow prisoners were taken from jail and brought before a higher court in Gallatin.
Final Refined Translation: A few days after sending these letters, Joseph and his fellow inmates were taken from the jail and presented before a higher court in Gallatin.

Source: Junte-se a nós para preparar o lançamento oficial do novo programa de indexação com base no navegador no site FamilySearch.org!
First English Translation: Join us to prepare the official launch of the new browser-based indexing program in the e FamilySearch.org sit!
Final Refined Translation: Join us to prepare for the official launch of the new browser-based indexing program on the FamilySearch.org website!

Source: Talvez esse legado seja o que inspira as gerações futuras a segui-los, ou talvez isso realmente esteja no sangue da família.
First English Translation: Maybe that legacy is what inspires future generations to follow, or maybe that really is in the blood of the family.
Final Refined Translation: Perhaps this legacy inspires future generations to follow in their footsteps, or it may truly be something inherent in the family's bloodline.

Source: Este projeto não tem nenhum lote disponível para retirada.
First English Translation: This project has no batch available for withdrawal.
Final Refined Translation: This project has no batches available for pickup.

Final Refined Translation: I cannot see the entire page of the project instructions.

Final Refined Translation: I felt deeply hurt when I heard them say, 'There goes the old Mother Smith.'

Final Refined Translation: If you are using this operating system, please download and use Firefox, Chrome, or Safari.

Final Refined Translation: I had been searching for 20 years to find any records of marriage or divorce for her parents.

Final Refined Translation: However, he now felt abandoned.

Final Refined Translation: In 1976, John F. and Carmen O'Donnal were called to serve as presidents of the Guatemala City Mission, and subsequently, the Guatemala Quetzaltenango Mission.

Source: Kimball assegurou a ele que os membros da área haviam expressado confiança nele.
First English Translation: Kimball assured him that members of the area had expressed confidence in him.
Final Refined Translation: Kimball assured him that the team members had expressed their confidence in him.

Source: Nomeado para a Junta Educacional da Igreja
First English Translation: Named for Church Educational Board
Final Refined Translation: Appointed to the Church Education Committee

Source: Você será notificado quando um patriarca for atribuído.
First English Translation: You will be notified when a patriarch is assigned.
Final Refined Translation: You will be notified when a patriarch is assigned.

Source: Sem dúvida, milhares de vidas serão modificadas com o resultado do esforço de hoje.
First English Translation: Undoubtedly, thousands of lives will be modified with the result of today's effort.
Final Refined Translation: Without a doubt, thousands of lives will be transformed as a result of today’s efforts.

Source: Indexar registros históricos, talvez da terra natal de um antepassado.
First English Translation: Index historical records, perhaps from the homeland of an ancestor.
Final Refined Translation: Index historical records, possibly from the homeland of an ancestor.

First English Translation: Collage and acrylic paint on panel Sabrina Jill Squires United States
Final Refined Translation: Collage and acrylic paint on panel by Sabrina Jill Squires, United States

Source: Entrevistas recentes com diretores de indexação da estaca e líderes do sacerdócio mostram como determinadas estacas estão combinando perfeitamente a indexação com outras atividades de história da família em um esforço harmonioso que abençoa a vida em ambos os lados do véu.
First English Translation: Recent interviews with stake indexing directors and priesthood leaders show how determined stakes are seamlessly combining indexing with other family history activities in a harmonious effort that bless life on both sides of the veil.
Final Refined Translation: Recent interviews with indexing directors from the stakes and priesthood leaders illustrate how certain stakes are effectively integrating indexing with various family history activities in a cohesive effort that blesses lives on both sides of the veil.

Source: Sou tão grata por essas histórias terem sido compartilhadas, mas, não apenas compartilhadas preservadas.
First English Translation: I am so grateful that these stories have been shared, but, not just shared preserved.
Final Refined Translation: I am so grateful for these stories being shared, and not only shared but also preserved.

Source: Conforme esperado, Joseph a ensinou sobre isso e perguntou se ela seria selada a ele.
First English Translation: As expected, Joseph taught her about it and asked if she would be sealed to him.
Final Refined Translation: As anticipated, Joseph instructed her on this matter and inquired whether she would be sealed to him.

Final Refined Translation: Sweden, Church Records of Örebro, 1613-1918; Index 1635-1860

Source: Coloque mais informações e detalhes aqui.
First English Translation: Put more information and details here.
Final Refined Translation: Add more information and details here.

Source: Mercy perdera outro marido no auge da vida.
First English Translation: Mercy had lost another husband in the prime of her life.
Final Refined Translation: Mercy had lost yet another husband during the prime of her life.

Source: Agora você pode deslizar o nome da pessoa para removê-la do Histórico ou da lista de Antepassados com Tarefas.
First English Translation: You can now swipe the person's name to remove them from History or the list of Tasking Antheads.
Final Refined Translation: You can now swipe the person's name to remove them from the History or the list of Task Ancestors.

Source: A Firma Unida desempenhou um papel essencial na administração da Igreja de 1832 a 1834, exatamente como Whitney desempenhou um papel primordial na própria firma.
First English Translation: The United Firm played an essential role in the administration of the Church from 1832 to 1834, just as Whitney played a paramount role in the firm itself.
Final Refined Translation: The United Firm held a crucial position in managing the Church from 1832 to 1834, just as Whitney was instrumental to the firm itself.

Source: E pensava: Não sou tão digna.
First English Translation: And I thought: I'm not so worthy.
Final Refined Translation: And I thought: I am not worthy.

Source: 3 Néfi 11:10; 15:2124; ver também João 10:16.
First English Translation: 3 Nephi 11:10; 15:2124; see also John 10:16.
Final Refined Translation: 3 Nephi 11:10; 15:21-24; refer to John 10:16 as well.

Source: Os seis missionários e o motorista começaram a procurar por gasolina, a fim de continuar com sua jornada; por fim, trocaram meia saca de arroz por quinze litros de combustível mesmo sabendo que não seria suficiente para os quase 600 quilômetros de péssimas estradas.
First English Translation: The six missionaries and the driver began to search for gasoline, in order to continue with their journey; eventually they exchanged half a pack of rice for fifteen litres of fuel even though they knew it would not be enough for the nearly 600 kilometres of bad roads.
Final Refined Translation: The six missionaries and the driver started looking for gasoline in order to continue their journey; ultimately, they traded half a sack of rice for fifteen liters of fuel, fully aware that it would not be enough for the almost 600 kilometers of poorly maintained roads that lay ahead.

Source: Pouco se sabe sobre o conhecimento e os sentimentos de Emma em relação a esses casamentos, alguns dos quais envolviam compromissos nesta vida, ao passo que outros envolviam compromissos somente para a vida futura.
First English Translation: Little is known about Emma's knowledge and feelings towards these marriages, some of which involved commitments in this life, whereas others involved commitments only for the future life.
Final Refined Translation: Little is known about Emma's understanding and emotions regarding these marriages, some of which involved commitments in this life, while others were solely related to the afterlife.

Source: Clique na seta para fechar o painel.
First English Translation: Click the arrow to close the panel.
Final Refined Translation: Click the arrow to close the panel.

Source: E compreendes seu pensar,
First English Translation: And you understand your thinking,
Final Refined Translation: And you understand your thoughts.

Source: Os acontecimentos em Carthage levaram Joseph Fielding a encher várias páginas de seu diário com comentários sobre a vida, missão e morte de Joseph Smith.
First English Translation: The events in Carthage led Joseph Fielding to fill several pages of his diary with commentary on the life, mission, and death of Joseph Smith.
Final Refined Translation: The events in Carthage prompted Joseph Fielding to write extensively in his diary about the life, mission, and death of Joseph Smith.

Source: O Élder Quentin L. Cook, que falará mais tarde nesta conferência, disse que A liderança da Igreja conclamou a nova geração a liderar o caminho no uso da tecnologia para vivenciar o espírito de Elias, pesquisar seus antepassados e realizar as ordenanças do templo para eles.
First English Translation: Elder Quentin L. Cook, who will speak later at this conference, said Church leadership called on the new generation to lead the way in using technology to experience the spirit of Elijah, research his forebears and carry out temple ordinances for them.
Final Refined Translation: Elder Quentin L. Cook, who will be speaking later in this conference, stated that the Church leadership has urged the new generation to lead the way in utilizing technology to experience the spirit of Elijah, research their ancestors, and perform temple ordinances on their behalf.

Source: Annie Noble se filiou à Igreja Batista quando se casou.
First English Translation: Annie Noble joined the Baptist Church when she married.
Final Refined Translation: Annie Noble became a member of the Baptist Church when she got married.

Source: Esse recurso aumenta o valor do Catálogo do FamilySearch como auxílio de pesquisa, tornando-se muito mais eficiente passar dos itens do catálogo para os dados digitais online.
First English Translation: This feature increases the value of the FamilySearch Catalog as a search aid, making it much more efficient to move from catalog items to online digital data.
Final Refined Translation: This feature increases the value of the FamilySearch Catalog as a research tool, significantly improving the efficiency of moving from catalog items to online digital data.

Source: e mediu mais mil, e me fez passar por águas que me davam pelos lombos.
First English Translation: And measured a thousand more, and passed me through waters that gave me by the loins.
Final Refined Translation: And He measured another thousand, and brought me through waters that reached my lower back.

Source: Defina o endereço de IP estático da impressora.

Final Refined Translation: Configure the printer's static IP address.

Source: O templo ainda estava longe de ser terminado e, se os santos fugissem da cidade, dificilmente conseguiriam receber sua investidura.
First English Translation: The temple was still far from finished, and if the saints fled the city, they could hardly receive their investiture.
Final Refined Translation: The temple was still far from completion, and if the saints were to flee the city, they would likely find it difficult to receive their investiture.

Source: Precisamos especialmente de ajuda na indexação de registros em espanhol, francês, italiano e português.

Final Refined Translation: Index by Section Number

Final Refined Translation: Our prayers must be sincere

Final Refined Translation: Simple Ways to Celebrate Family History Month: A Journey into the Past

Final Refined Translation: On that day, I remember feeling extremely tired and having no desire to do anything.

Final Refined Translation: If you have submitted the person's information in a GEDCOM file, please add either a date or a place of death.

Final Refined Translation: The Relief Societies indicated that there is at least one social service assistance available at each stake, and additional assistance is provided at the ward level when necessary.

Final Refined Translation: Similarly, he hopes that the app will be made available at no cost to the thousands of students in classrooms throughout the United States.

Final Refined Translation: Carry your ancestors with you.

First English Translation: A few days later, a message from Joseph Ball, a missionary working in the Fox Islands, reported that the Kirtland dissidents had sent letters to the Wilford converts from that location, trying to influence their faith.
Final Refined Translation: A few days later, a message from Joseph Ball, a missionary serving in the Fox Islands, reported that the dissidents from Kirtland had sent letters to the converts of Wilford in that area, attempting to sway their faith.

Final Refined Translation: Sacrificing Football for Service

Final Refined Translation: I would like to get in touch with someone who is working on my ancestry lineage.

Final Refined Translation: Each individual received a small magnifying lens along with a certificate of completion.

Final Refined Translation: The text of the prayer was incorporated into the Doctrine and Covenants as section 109 in 1876.

Source: A maioria dos casos foi julgada por um tribunal do bispo ou pelo sumo conselho.
First English Translation: Most of the cases were tried by a bishop's court or the high council.
Final Refined Translation: Most cases were adjudicated by either a bishop's court or the supreme council.

Source: Em muitos casos o software do FamilySearch ajuda nesse processo.
First English Translation: In many cases the FamilySearch software helps in this process.
Final Refined Translation: In many instances, the FamilySearch software assists in this process.

Source: Vou como um cordeiro para o matadouro, disse o profeta, mas estou calmo como uma manhã de verão; tenho a consciência limpa em relação a Deus e em relação a todos os homens. Morrerei inocente.
First English Translation: I go like a lamb to the slaughterhouse, the prophet said, but I am calm like a summer morning; I have a clear conscience towards God and towards all men. I'm gonna die innocent.
Final Refined Translation: I go like a lamb to the slaughter, the prophet said, yet I am as calm as a summer morning; my conscience is clear before God and all of humanity. I will die innocent.

Source: Altere seu perfil de modo a incluir o país em que reside.
First English Translation: Change your profile to include the country in which you live.
Final Refined Translation: Please update your profile to include the country where you reside.

Source: Peça aos seus pais e avós para falar sobre a vida deles e o que eles se lembram de seus parentes falecidos, e grave suas histórias usando o aplicativo.
First English Translation: Ask your parents and grandparents to talk about their lives and what they remember from their deceased relatives, and record your stories using the app.
Final Refined Translation: Encourage your parents and grandparents to share stories about their lives and their memories of deceased relatives, and make sure to record these narratives using the app.

Source: N. Eldon Tanner era primeiro conselheiro na Primeira Presidência na época da desobrigação da irmã Spafford; Tanner e ela foram bons amigos.

Final Refined Translation: N. Eldon Tanner served as the first counselor in the First Presidency during Sister Spafford's release; he and she shared a close friendship.

Final Refined Translation: I understand that some people might be afraid of us because they do not know who we are.

Source: O usuário não foi encontrado.

Final Refined Translation: The user was not found.

Final Refined Translation: I believe that there has never been a family more obedient than mine, and...

Source: Sinto-me grato por estar aqui com minha esposa, Ruth.
First English Translation: I'm grateful to be here with my wife, Ruth.
Final Refined Translation: I feel grateful to be here with my wife, Ruth.

Source: Isso torna o programa mais fácil para aqueles que começarem a usar o programa pela primeira vez.

First English Translation: Spencer W. Kimball, president of the Church, announces that a temple will be built in Tokyo.
Final Refined Translation: Spencer W. Kimball, the president of the Church, announces that a temple is to be built in Tokyo.

Source: Em vez de seguir um plano de aula específico, ajude-os com suas necessidades e interesses.
First English Translation: Instead of following a specific lesson plan, help them with their needs and interests.
Final Refined Translation: Rather than adhering to a specific lesson plan, assist them in addressing their needs and interests.
